author: Staff Reporter
text:
A Sub-Inspector of Police was assaulted by a person, an accused in several cases, during a temple festival in Periyakulam on Friday.

The injured SI, Pandia Rajan, attached to Periyakulam police station, was admitted to the government hospital. Ponnuthai of Periyakulam was arrested in this connection.

When Mr. Pandia Rajan was on duty during the temple festival, Ponnuthai noticed him and thought that he had come there to arrest him.

Ponnuthai, who was in an inebriated mood, attacked the SI on the head. When Ponnuthai tried to escape from the spot after assaulting the SI, the local people caught him and handed him over to the police. A case was registered against him.

A few weeks ago an SI was attacked by a person, who was in an inebriated mood, in Dindigul when he tried to stop a quarrel between two persons at a bar attached to a Tasmac outlet.
title: SI assaulted at temple festival
